title: A Trail of destruction

abstract: 'It was a Thursday. Like any other day, I was getting ready for school in my room.'
description: The whole thing probably lasted about twenty seconds, but for Jeremy Somerville, his family and community, it is an event they will never forget. On the 3rd of June 2010, the residents of Lennox Head, on the North Coast of New South Wales, were preparing for the day ahead when their town was struck by a tornado.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002419; Living with disaster 2 : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2010
